mapper.select: SELECT doc.id AS document_id, doc.created_date AS created_date, i.id AS item_id, i.description AS item_description, u.id AS user_id, u.firstname AS user_firstname, u.lastname AS user_lastname FROM documents doc, items i, document_items di, users u WHERE doc.id = #{document_id} AND u.id = #{user_id} AND doc.user_id = u.id AND di.document_id = doc.id AND di.item_id = i.id;
